message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a unique opportunity to get something truly special at an exclusive price. I'm offering it to you for $100. This is a limited-time offer, so don't hesitate to take advantage of it!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer.  The product looks great, but $100 is a bit too high for my budget. Would you consider a lower price?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, and I'm willing to negotiate. I would like to offer you the product for $75. This is a competitive price considering the value it offers, and I believe it will be more within your budget.
